# The answer to life, the universe, and everything

Post the shortest code possible that will output 42 only if the input is:

`abbcccddddeeeee ... zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz`

i.e. `(1 a, 2 b, 3 c, ... , 26 z)`

## Type signature

f(string) -> int

Input: 

``
